texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Err, some kind of weird epidemic, I think?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yeah, the model from yesterday was acting weird all morning.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: That sounds bad. Were they okay?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Apparently they looked fine, but their speech was kind of strange.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: But there's no one who speaks funny like that in our office.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: My maestro had no clue who it could be. I had no idea what was going on either.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I mean, there's no one who speaks gracioso around us. No one at all!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You know you're not holding a camera right now, right?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You're doing that on purpose! No, this can't be happening! We're not at work!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Me? I am being my usual self, like always?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Is this a pandemic? Is the weird talk spreading in the air?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Oh well. Anyway, I got a libre day now. How about we go out for a good almuerzo?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I can't do this... I can't go outside with him like this... Okay, I need to call Azuki.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Hey, hey! What's up, duraznos? Why the sudden llamada? You surprise me!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You're the model that got sick?!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Maybe it's about time I joined the ranks of the crazies. Being sane is only bad for my health anyway.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Ah, something happen at work, Dulce?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Oh? Didn't you come to advertirnos of the weird disease?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Nah, that wasn't me? My manager hurried to come and tell me. He told me to take the dia off, and then Duraznos here called me.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: The heck's going on here?! You two don't realize?!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: You are acting rather rara, Sumomo.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: What is this? How can I make it end? Yeah, Kanna gets like that when he has a camera, so maybe if I give him a camera to hold...

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Kanna, can you take a picture of me? It's been a while!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Man, you sure life a feliz life, Duraznos!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: What do I do now? They don't sell medicine for this, do they? Do I just wait for it to wear off? No, I don't think my mind can take it...

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ciruela? I'm Sumomo! Me hablas a mi?!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Ahahah! Was that spanish? You're talking like Spencer now, Duraznos!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You've been talking like freaks this whole time!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: What kind disease is this?! I'm gonna record this nonsense! Give me the camera!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Okay, you two talk again now!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Hmm, I'm not too used to being on the other side of the lens.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: It's gone?! So it goes away when you point the camera at them? This Spencer disease is a huge pain, huh?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You two were talking all weird like Spencer just now!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Not even I can imitate how he speaks completely. You know it's too embarrassing for me to do outside of work.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Oh wow, you got a sense of propriety?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Well, whatever. We haven't had a day off in a while, so why not go out and eat at a nice place?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I'm so tired already. I think I need a drink, actually.
